short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly summarize webpage with webpage summariser. Get instant overviews of articles, blogs and any online content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly grasp the essence of any webpage with Your Own Webpage Summariser, your personalised Chrome extension for efficient browsing.

Key Features:

1. One-click summaries of any web page
2. Support for multiple languages
3. Keeps summarised page in memory to avoid running summarisation each time. If page has changed you can still rerun summarisation. 
4. Use your own OpenAI API key for cost control

How It Works:

1. Click the extension icon on any webpage
2. Get an instant, accurate summary of the page content in your preferred language

Perfect for students, researchers, and busy professionals who browse multilingual content. Save time and boost productivity with Your Own Webpage Summariser!

Benefits of using your own API Key:
1.You have a direct relationship with OpenAI for the AI services used by the extension.
2. When you use your own API key, you're billed directly by OpenAI based on your usage.
3. You have the ability to set usage limits or budgets with OpenAI to prevent unexpected charges.
4. You can monitor your usage and costs directly through your OpenAI account.
